about_the_game:
The contents of the DLC Pack CAN BE CLAIMED IN-GAME from ESC Menu > Community > Redeem.



Explorer to Conqueror contents:
○ Blessing of Old Moon Pack (15 Days)
    • Contains a Value Pack, Blessing of Kamasylve, and a Secret Book of Old Moon. These items provide extremely useful benefits that will enhance your adventure!‏‏
○ Choose Your Horse Gear Set Box
    • Every horse needs some cool-looking gear! Four options of functional and aesthetic gear to choose from.‏‏
○ [Event] Premium Outfit Box
    • Going on an adventure? You’ll need the right threads for your character. Open this box to obtain a premium outfit suitable for your class.‏‏
○ [Event] Maid for Hire Box x2
    • Convenience is key! Use maids to move items between your warehouse and storage with ease.‏‏
○ Choose Your Tier 3 Pet Box
    • Select a cute tier 3 pet of your choosing! This helpful companion will gather loot and provide you with a variety of buffs to help you on your adventure.‏‏
○ Assorted Scroll Box
    • This nifty box contains scrolls to maximize and aid your progress!‏‏
○ 30% Discount Coupon
    • Get more bang for your buck! 30% off any pearl item in the shop (F3).‏‏
○ 3,000 Pearls
    • Pearls to use in the Pearl Shop in-game. Time to shop!‏‏

※ Notices
- This product requires the purchase of the Black Desert game to use, and content will be delivered to the server in the region of purchase.
- Please check the item descriptions in-game for more details on how each item is bound.
Items that have already been issued or consumed cannot be restored and/or refunded.
- You can only purchase each DLC pack once per account.
- You cannot gift or give this DLC pack to another.
- The contents of the DLC pack are subject to change after the initial announcement.
- The contents of the DLC pack can be claimed in-game from ESC Menu > Community > Redeem.
- The contents of the DLC pack may have certain limitations for being traded/sold/bound, and the usage period. You may not move or restore the contents for these reasons.
- Accounts that were banned due to inappropriate behavior or violation of operational policies may not use a purchased DLC pack.
- You cannot use an inventory slot expansion coupon if your character's total number of slots exceeds the maximum limit of 192 slots.
- All DLC purchases are final and cannot be refunded as long as the DLC and its contents were purchased according to the stated service guidelines.
- For all questions related to Black Desert purchases, please refer to the FAQ or contact Support.
- For all further inquiries related to Black Desert operations, please refer to the Black Desert Operational Policy.
detailed_description:
EXPLORER TO CONQUEROR



About the Game

The contents of the DLC Pack CAN BE CLAIMED IN-GAME from ESC Menu > Community > Redeem.



Explorer to Conqueror contents:
○ Blessing of Old Moon Pack (15 Days)
    • Contains a Value Pack, Blessing of Kamasylve, and a Secret Book of Old Moon. These items provide extremely useful benefits that will enhance your adventure!‏‏
○ Choose Your Horse Gear Set Box
    • Every horse needs some cool-looking gear! Four options of functional and aesthetic gear to choose from.‏‏
○ [Event] Premium Outfit Box
    • Going on an adventure? You’ll need the right threads for your character. Open this box to obtain a premium outfit suitable for your class.‏‏
○ [Event] Maid for Hire Box x2
    • Convenience is key! Use maids to move items between your warehouse and storage with ease.‏‏
○ Choose Your Tier 3 Pet Box
    • Select a cute tier 3 pet of your choosing! This helpful companion will gather loot and provide you with a variety of buffs to help you on your adventure.‏‏
○ Assorted Scroll Box
    • This nifty box contains scrolls to maximize and aid your progress!‏‏
○ 30% Discount Coupon
    • Get more bang for your buck! 30% off any pearl item in the shop (F3).‏‏
○ 3,000 Pearls
    • Pearls to use in the Pearl Shop in-game. Time to shop!‏‏

※ Notices
- This product requires the purchase of the Black Desert game to use, and content will be delivered to the server in the region of purchase.
- Please check the item descriptions in-game for more details on how each item is bound.
Items that have already been issued or consumed cannot be restored and/or refunded.
- You can only purchase each DLC pack once per account.
- You cannot gift or give this DLC pack to another.
- The contents of the DLC pack are subject to change after the initial announcement.
- The contents of the DLC pack can be claimed in-game from ESC Menu > Community > Redeem.
- The contents of the DLC pack may have certain limitations for being traded/sold/bound, and the usage period. You may not move or restore the contents for these reasons.
- Accounts that were banned due to inappropriate behavior or violation of operational policies may not use a purchased DLC pack.
- You cannot use an inventory slot expansion coupon if your character's total number of slots exceeds the maximum limit of 192 slots.
- All DLC purchases are final and cannot be refunded as long as the DLC and its contents were purchased according to the stated service guidelines.
- For all questions related to Black Desert purchases, please refer to the FAQ or contact Support.
- For all further inquiries related to Black Desert operations, please refer to the Black Desert Operational Policy.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy [NA/EU] Black Desert - Explorer to Conqueror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTS 250, GeForce 9800 GTX, Radeon HD 3870 X2
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution: 1280x760
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970, AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution: 1920x1080 or higher

short_description: Experience the vast open world of the Black Desert and immerse yourself in a game that redefines the MMORPG genre with its stunning graphics, skill-based combat, and Siege wars. Adventurers can also explore, fish, tame horses, cook, gather, hunt and so much more in the ultimate MMORPG, Black Desert.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
